comment: She might be the worst professor i've taken since I've been at KSU. Gave me a zero on an assignment that I told her she never opened for me and will not respond to my emails at all. I have done all the assignments on time and this one I had to turn in late & she gave me a zero after claiming to "look into it" & get back with me which she never did.
She is good but you will have a tuff time getting in touch with her. If you study you will pass. I highly recommend her if you want to get some of her classes. She is a good teacher!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Amazing lectures

comment: She is pretty funny and makes dry content interesting. She teaches what you need to know for the assignments and tests. She does not grade harshly.

If you don't mind a passive aggressive professor that can only be contacted by D2L's confusing email system, she's just for you. LOTS of busy work that is unrelated to the class description. Fortunately though, the class is pretty easy. With the assignments/discussions being mainly opinion based papers, and the exams being very "researchable".
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--So many papers
